description: The directory schema of a card, using the format of https://github.com/jpoehnelt/directory-schema-validator
$comment: Since this schema is now used as $defs-subschema, it can be removed.

name.description: The name of the card directory is the card key, for example ABC-123

index.json.description: The fields of the card. This file must validate against both the card-base-schema.json and the custom fields of its cardtype

index.adoc.description: The description field of the card as an Asciidoc file

a.description: A directory for file attachments of the card

^[a-z]+_[0-9]+$.description: A directory that contains a child card. The name of the directory is the cardkey, for example ABC-123.
